title: Add labels to action buttons and remove character count text from message input

requirements.summary: Add visible text labels ('Reply', 'React', 'Share', 'Flag') to the four message action buttons in MessageBubble.tsx alongside their existing icons
acceptanceCriteria: The Reply action button displays the text label 'Reply'
The React action button displays the text label 'React'
The Share action button displays the text label 'Share'
The Flag action button displays the text label 'Flag'
Each label is visible alongside the button's icon
No other changes are made to the buttons (size, color, behavior, layout remain the same)

file_operations.description: Add text labels 'Reply', 'React', 'Share', and 'Flag' to each of the four message action buttons. Display each label alongside its corresponding icon without modifying button size, color, behavior, or layout. Ensure the labels are visible and properly aligned with their icons.

requirements.summary: Remove the numeric character count text display from the message input area in MessageInput.tsx while keeping any non-text counter indicator (e.g., progress ring)
acceptanceCriteria: No numeric character count text is rendered in the message input area
Any non-text counter indicator (e.g., ring, bar) may remain if present
No other changes are made to the message input component

file_operations.description: Remove the numeric character count text from the character counter display in the message input area. If a visual counter indicator (such as a progress ring or bar) exists, keep it intact. Only remove the text that shows the numeric character count value.
